searchDocs.title: Introduction
searchDocs.content: Introduction TODO User manual Reference manual EBNF resources

searchDocs.title: Behaviour​
searchDocs.content: The operator has the behaviour of the “Operators applicable on two Scalar Values or Data Sets or Data Set Components” (see the section “Typical behaviours of the ML Operators”).

searchDocs.title: Input parameters type​
searchDocs.content: op1, op2: string or component<string> or dataset { measure<string> _+ }

searchDocs.title: Result type​
searchDocs.content: result: string or component<string> or dataset { measure<string> _+ }

searchDocs.title: Examples​
searchDocs.content: str := "Hello" || " " || "world"; ds_comp_concat := ds1[calc concat := str1 || " " || str2]; ds_concat := ds2#str1[rename str1 to concat] || " " || ds1#str2[rename str2 to concat];

searchDocs.title: Results​
searchDocs.content: ds1 id	str1	str21	a	toto 2	b	titi 3	c	tata ds2 id	str11	Hello 2	Hi 3	Hey ds_comp_concat id	str1	str2	concat1	a	toto	a toto 2	b	titi	b titi 3	c	tata	c tata ds_concat id	concat1	Hello toto 2	Hi titi 3	Hey tata
